sys_update_version.name: sys_transform_script_adb8f1292f1820100a8bd39df699b62f
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="Cisco CBP Summary TM">f8b4a8e52f5020100a8bd39df699b632</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runTransformScript(source, map, log, target /*undefined onStart*/ ) {
    /*var logger = new Cisco_BCS_SNLogger();
    var daoScript = new Cisco_DAOScript();
    try {
        logger.debug("Inside CBP Summary transform map.");
        var sys_id = daoScript.getReferenceMapping("cbpRules", "bp_rule_id", target.bp_rule_id);
        target.cbp_rule = sys_id;

        target.update();
    } catch (e) {
        logger.error("Exception caught inside CBP Summary transform map. Error : - " + e);
    }*/
	
	var dao = new Cisco_DAOScript();
	
	// CBP Rules 
	var resultCbpRules = dao.createReferences(target.bp_rule_id, "bp_rule_id", "cbp_summary", target.sys_id, "x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_cbp_rules", true);
	if(resultCbpRules){
		target.cbp_rule = resultCbpRules + "";
		target.update();
	}
	
	//for cbp summary calculated field
	var calculatedFieldValue = dao.calculateField("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cbp_rules_references","","bp_rule_id=" + target.bp_rule_id + "");
	target.rule_references = calculatedFieldValue;
	target.update();
	
	
	
// 	target.update();
	
})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-11-05 14:21:38</sys_created_on><sys_id>adb8f1292f1820100a8bd39df699b62f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onAfter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cisco BCS Operational Insights" source="x_caci_cisco_bcs">56b8d9362f3310108956ea5ef699b62d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Cisco BCS Operational Insights">56b8d9362f3310108956ea5ef699b62d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_adb8f1292f1820100a8bd39df699b62f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-16 12:54:07</sys_updated_on><when>onAfter</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
